text: kmean tosapei avei champoh puok anak laey brasenbae puok anak chaul( daoy kmean karoanounhnhat) tow samreakkeay knong lomnow dthan neanea delke sangosang minmen samreab rsanow noh( dauchchea sala chh tean) . haey a l laoh doeng nouv avei del puok anak leatatradeang ning avei del puok anak leak kambang
